products.fullDescription: Retreat 0100 Nature's Elements. Machine-Made of Polyester Chenille with Latex. Made in Turkey. The fibers in this rug are treated with a permanent finish that prevents liquid from penetrating the fibers and repels stains. Spills pool on the rug’s surface instead of seeping into the rug making it easy to clean. Blot spills and spray stains with water and clean with towel. Vacuum rug regularly or as necessary.

collections.name: Allure
collections.description: Luxurious, comfortable & durable…a striking mix of style & life! Super soft, luxurious patterned shags made of 100% polyester…simply gorgeous for entertaining yet durable enough for every day life.

collections.name: Avalon
collections.description: Traditional and classic at a great value best describes our Avalon Collection! The updated color palette adds a fresh touch of elegance to any lifestyle. This collection is a tremendous value and makes for easy upkeep.

collections.name: Bali
collections.description: The Bali Collection presents a relaxed look in a richly colored and textured construction. Densely hand-woven polyacrylic is hand carved and specially dyed to add an extra special feel and dimension to each piece.

collections.name: Birch
collections.description: Create casual elegance at home with these multi-textured wool and viscose rugs. The combination of a neutral color palette and a cut and loop pile gives this collection a gorgeous rich texture perfect for any home.

collections.name: Cambridge
collections.description: Our Cambridge Series features a current color palette in classic and transitional patterns providing a well-designed and durable rug at a very affordable price point. Our Cambridge Series is a fashion leader in its class.

collections.name: Carmen
collections.description: Looking for that perfect Boho-chic rug? Well, Carmen is perfect for you! This collection offers that trendy bohemian and global  look and feel in a very livable color palette.

collections.name: Colonial
collections.description: Our Colonial Collection of hooked wool rugs exhibits the true creativity of our designers. Originally a craft born out of necessity, hooked rugs have now become a form of art, taking shape with the talent of designers and weavers. This exquisite hooked rug collection contains an assortment of styles that suit a wide range of tastes. Our Colonial rugs come in both classic and trendy designs, including florals and nauticals. The intricate design and myriad of colors add both a lively and rich look.

collections.name: Coral
collections.description: Live stylishly in the tropics with our Coral Collection. Handmade with an abrash effect, these rugs will help bring the outdoors inside in a fashionable color palette…create an everlasting breeze throughout your home.

collections.name: Emerald
collections.description: Our Emerald Collection is a rich and vibrant line of high density hand-tufted wool rugs. Made in China, this collection offers intricate designs in a medley of lush colors. The designs range from classic patterns to contemporary florals. These rugs complement a broad range of decorating styles.

collections.name: Eternity
collections.description: Step into our world and experience a multi-textured masterpiece from our Eternity Collection. These rugs are woven using multi-textured wool, a versatile color palette and a Hi/Lo effect, bringing modern simplicity into our lives. The combination of timeless colors and a variety of textures will create an everlasting presence in any room while setting the foundation for any decorating style.

collections.name: Harbor
collections.description: Keep it trendy outdoors or brighten up the indoors with one of our finely-crafted Harbor rugs. These rugs stay in tune with today's home décor trends and bring a touch of sophistication to your living space.

collections.name: Heritage
collections.description: Step into our Heritage Collection and discover the beauty in each pattern. With a warm and earthy color palette,  this collection offers a myriad of decorating possibilities.

collections.name: Illusions
collections.description: Our Illusions Collection features an array of show-stopping watercolor designs.  Each pattern is a piece of art for your floors. Ranging from tonals to vibrant palettes, there is sure to be an Illusion to peak your interest!

collections.name: Impressions
collections.description: Hand-tufted in India of wool and viscose highlights, these transitional rugs will add a touch of style to any space. Impressions is simple, yet dramatic at the same time and will leave an “impression” in your room. The cut and loop effect on the wool and viscose makes for a remarkable piece.

collections.name: Key West
collections.description: Take the party outdoors with these bold show-stopping indoor/outdoor polyester shag rugs. Available in an array of fashionable colors, these sumptuous shags are perfect to lounge on inside or in the backyard.

collections.name: Kidding Around
collections.description: Bring out the kid in you as you frolic through our Kidding Around Collection. These rugs give toddlers and teens a place to relax and play. Fun and colorful themes give these rugs a playful look and feel.

collections.name: Meridian
collections.description: Lounge in casual comfort outdoors with our Meridian Collection. Hand-hooked in China of 100% UV-treated polypropelene, you can bring depth indoors or out with the multi-textured and Hi/Lo effects of these rugs. Simple yet trendy designs combined with a striking color palette make these rugs a fashion statement for your outdoor or indoor haven.

collections.name: Reflections
collections.description: Experience vibrant water-color effects in a gorgeous textured pile across floral and transitional looks.

collections.name: Retreat
collections.description: Retreat is an Easy Care flatweave collection, machine-made of 100% polyester chenille with a non-skid backing. The fibers in this rug are treated with a special finish that that prevents liquid from penetrating the fibers and repels stains.  It’s truly remarkable. The collection features contemporary, transitional and traditional patterns making it easy to choose the perfect rug for your lifestyle. These rugs work well in high traffic areas, under dining room tables, kids play areas and anywhere else you see fit. Retreat is made in Turkey and a low profile 1/4" Pile Height.

collections.name: Tahoe
collections.description: If simple Southwest is your style, our Tahoe Collection is perfect for you! Everyday patterns against a neutral color palette in these machine-loomed wool flatweaves brings you the best of both worlds. These rugs are made in Turkey with a very low 1/4" pile height.
